mapper.insert: INSERT INTO room ( `id`, `create_date` createDate, `modify_date` modifyDate, `descri`, `head_img` headImg, `name`, `opener_price` openerPrice, `send_price` sendPrice, `status`, `control_game` controlGame, `control_model` controlModel, `game_type` gameType, `limit_num` limitNum, `open_fee_add` openFeeAdd, `open_fee_sum` openFeeSum, `owner`, `player_win_rate_s1` playerWinRateS1, `psw`, `send_count` sendCount, `send_fee_add` sendFeeAdd, `send_fee_sum` sendFeeSum, ``un_dead` unDead,`, `player_open_win_rate_s1` playerOpenWinRateS1, `player_send_win_rate_s1` playerSendWinRateS1, `room_id` roomId, `props`, `subname`, `fixed_robot_ids` fixedRobotIds, `win_fee_add` winFeeAdd, `win_fee_sum` winFeeSum, `rule_pic` rulePic, `game_status` gameStatus, `end_date` endDate, `owner_uuid` ownerUuid, `independence`, `agent_red_fan_dian` agentRedFanDian, `max_robot_count` maxRobotCount, `open_red_delay_end` openRedDelayEnd, `open_red_delay_start` openRedDelayStart, `fateqq_codepay_id` fateqqCodepayId, `fateqq_key` fateqqKey, `fateqq_token` fateqqToken, `domain`, `robot_rule` robotRule, `member_ids` memberIds, `stopspeak_member_ids`, `member_mgr_ids` memberMgrIds, `yaoqing_able` yaoqingAble, `yaoqing_audit_able` yaoqingAuditAble, `use_custom_headpic` useCustomHeadpic, `org_id` orgId ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createDate}, #{modifyDate}, #{descri}, #{headImg}, #{name}, #{openerPrice}, #{sendPrice}, #{status}, #{controlGame}, #{controlModel}, #{gameType}, #{limitNum}, #{openFeeAdd}, #{openFeeSum}, #{owner}, #{playerWinRateS1}, #{psw}, #{sendCount}, #{sendFeeAdd}, #{sendFeeSum}, #{unDead}, #{playerOpenWinRateS1}, #{playerSendWinRateS1}, #{roomId}, #{props}, #{subname}, #{fixedRobotIds}, #{winFeeAdd}, #{winFeeSum}, #{rulePic}, #{gameStatus}, #{endDate}, #{ownerUuid}, #{independence}, #{agentRedFanDian}, #{maxRobotCount}, #{openRedDelayEnd}, #{openRedDelayStart}, #{fateqqCodepayId}, #{fateqqKey}, #{fateqqToken}, #{domain}, #{robotRule}, #{memberIds}, #{stopspeakMemberIds}, #{memberMgrIds}, #{yaoqingAble}, #{yaoqingAuditAble}, #{useCustomHeadpic}, #{orgId} )
mapper.select: SELECT `id`, `create_date` createDate, `modify_date` modifyDate, `descri`, `head_img` headImg, `name`, `opener_price` openerPrice, `send_price` sendPrice, `status`, `control_game` controlGame, `control_model` controlModel, `game_type` gameType, `limit_num` limitNum, `open_fee_add` openFeeAdd, `open_fee_sum` openFeeSum, `owner`, `player_win_rate_s1` playerWinRateS1, `psw`, `send_count` sendCount, `send_fee_add` sendFeeAdd, `send_fee_sum` sendFeeSum, ``un_dead` unDead,`, `player_open_win_rate_s1` playerOpenWinRateS1, `player_send_win_rate_s1` playerSendWinRateS1, `room_id` roomId, `props`, `subname`, `fixed_robot_ids` fixedRobotIds, `win_fee_add` winFeeAdd, `win_fee_sum` winFeeSum, `rule_pic` rulePic, `game_status` gameStatus, `end_date` endDate, `owner_uuid` ownerUuid, `independence`, `agent_red_fan_dian` agentRedFanDian, `max_robot_count` maxRobotCount, `open_red_delay_end` openRedDelayEnd, `open_red_delay_start` openRedDelayStart, `fateqq_codepay_id` fateqqCodepayId, `fateqq_key` fateqqKey, `fateqq_token` fateqqToken, `domain`, `robot_rule` robotRule, `member_ids` memberIds, `stopspeak_member_ids`, `member_mgr_ids` memberMgrIds, `yaoqing_able` yaoqingAble, `yaoqing_audit_able` yaoqingAuditAble, `use_custom_headpic` useCustomHeadpic, `org_id` orgId FROM room WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM room WHERE id IN
#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT `id`, `create_date` createDate, `modify_date` modifyDate, `descri`, `head_img` headImg, `name`, `opener_price` openerPrice, `send_price` sendPrice, `status`, `control_game` controlGame, `control_model` controlModel, `game_type` gameType, `limit_num` limitNum, `open_fee_add` openFeeAdd, `open_fee_sum` openFeeSum, `owner`, `player_win_rate_s1` playerWinRateS1, `psw`, `send_count` sendCount, `send_fee_add` sendFeeAdd, `send_fee_sum` sendFeeSum, ``un_dead` unDead,`, `player_open_win_rate_s1` playerOpenWinRateS1, `player_send_win_rate_s1` playerSendWinRateS1, `room_id` roomId, `props`, `subname`, `fixed_robot_ids` fixedRobotIds, `win_fee_add` winFeeAdd, `win_fee_sum` winFeeSum, `rule_pic` rulePic, `game_status` gameStatus, `end_date` endDate, `owner_uuid` ownerUuid, `independence`, `agent_red_fan_dian` agentRedFanDian, `max_robot_count` maxRobotCount, `open_red_delay_end` openRedDelayEnd, `open_red_delay_start` openRedDelayStart, `fateqq_codepay_id` fateqqCodepayId, `fateqq_key` fateqqKey, `fateqq_token` fateqqToken, `domain`, `robot_rule` robotRule, `member_ids` memberIds, `stopspeak_member_ids`, `member_mgr_ids` memberMgrIds, `yaoqing_able` yaoqingAble, `yaoqing_audit_able` yaoqingAuditAble, `use_custom_headpic` useCustomHeadpic, `org_id` orgId FROM room WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT count(1) FROM room WHERE org_id = #{orgId}
